modName: Alternative Start - Yargol an orc smith - RP
summary: Having lived a life secluded from society in his mountain stronghold of Narzulbur, Yargol takes his first steps into society while tracking a dragon.
descriptionHtml:
Narzulbur has been Yargol\'s home since his birth.  He was a good blacksmith like all orcs but then raised above his kinsmen and became the local smith of Narzulbur.  After advancing his black smith skills as far as he could in his stronghold he turned to magic to make his armor more powerful.  He soon became the local enchanter too.  Even though his skills would make him a excellent crafter, his true dream is to be a dragon slayer.  When a dragon is seen flying overhead traveling west, Yargol asks the chief permission to leave.  The chief grants permission.  The chief then gives Yargol a set of orcish armor and lays out some weapons on the table.  He then tells Yargol that dragons are mighty beings and tangling with one on your own is suicide.  He tells Yargol he must get help from Whiterun\'s jarl to slay this beast.  Yargol is then faced with the hardest choice of his life, should he take the two war axes or the battleaxe.  Lucky for him he wont have to, since you, the player, take over and make the choice for him.  

Credits:
